title: How Do I Build a Collection?
excerpt: Tip: Name the Collection by editing the default text. Also spend time
content:
1. Add content to the Collection by searching for or uploading it.

    Tip: Name the Collection by editing the default text. Also spend time organizing the content. It will improve the overall quality of the custom book.

  2. For a print Collection, select a cover image, define a title page, and select the print options.
  3. Supply course information for the course that will use the Collection.
  4. Review and submit the Collection for approval. Once approved, the Collection is printed as a custom book or is made available digitally for students to use.

If you are having trouble building a Collection, contact your Sales representative for assistance.
